record.darwin:Remarks: UNC-IMS 6336 & 6332 originally contained lots from multiple localities. These lots were split into multiple NCSM #s to conform to collection curation and data entry standards. The original label in the jar stated that these were UNC-IMS 6332 but the catalog book listed UNC-IMS 6332 as Anguilla rostrata. The catalog book was searched for a catalog number that listed the same species and number of specimens but none was found so assumption was made that this number was used twice. This lot contains specimens from both UNIC-IMS 6336 and 6332 because they were split at some point originally (at IMS).
